actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that the President should not transmit to the Congress any recommendations with respect to rates of pay for Members of Congress.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of Congress that the President should not transmit to the Congress any budget or other recommendations with respect to rates of pay for Members of Congress.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that the President should not transmit to the Congress any recommendations with respect to rates of pay for Members of Congress.
